content:
I am a first-year master student in the School of Computer Science at Fudan University, advised by Prof. Yang Chen with the Mobile Systems and Networking (MSN) group. Prior to that, I received my B.S. (with honors) from Fudan University, majored in Computer Science. My research interests consist of Computer Networking and Graph Analytics. Moreover, I have some engineering experience at Drone Control System.
I am currently working on accelerating web browsing via AI method, and maintaining a Python package, EasyGraph, for graph network analytics.

title: Zheng Li (李政)
How subtle can it get? A Trimodal Study of Ring-sized Interfaces for One-handed Drone Control.
